document.body:

Home How To Courses Answers Search Carls Jr. Printable Coupons Tweet Are you looking for coupons to take with you on your next trip to a Carl's Jr. restaurant? Carl's Jr. printable coupons can help you save dollars or cents off of your food purchase, and sometimes even entitle you to free items. This page will show you where to get these printable coupons so that you can enjoy a discount on your order from Carl's Jr.
The Carl's Jr. story began back in the year 1941 , when Carl Karcher and his wife Margaret purchased a hot dog cart. The couple had to get a loan against their car for $311, and then spend an additional $15 from their savings to get things started. Over the next few years they purchased a few more carts, and then eventually opened a restaurant called Carl's Drive-In Barbecue. http://www.carlsjr.com/company/story
These days, the fast food restaurant is simply called Carl's Jr., and locations exist all over the western states in America . The menu at Carl's Jr. is constantly changing, but guests can always count on classic hamburgers, French fries and milkshakes . http://www.carlsjr.com/menu
Where to Get Carl's Jr Coupons
Carl's Jr. makes it relatively easy for customers to get hold of online coupons . They actually offer printable coupons on a regular basis on the official company website. To access these coupons, go to www.carlsjr.com and click on the link that reads Promotions, which is located at the top of the page under an icon of a bull horn . A list of printable coupons will be on the right side of the page when they are available. http://www.carlsjr.com/promotions
Coupon Policies
All Carl's Jr. printable coupons are only valid at participating locations. Tax is typically not included in the discount. Only a single customer may use a coupon during a visit to Carl's Jr. Most coupons may not be used with other promotional offers. Other rules and restrictions may apply. http://www.carlsjr.com/promotions/coupon/dollar-off-teriyaki-chicken/
